!Library of Sages Director Sophia: I never thought I'd see this book again. No seriously, a long time ago Agnes, who is now called Saint of Light, and myself went camping. We realized we forgot the kindling needed to start the campfire, but she did have this book. Look, I'm a librarian, I can't really say what happened next... anyway... somehow it is back as if fate had its own plans for the book. ...I think you should take it back to Agnes, Saint of Light in Goddard Town.
